column1: doris susan stokes| doris susan stokes. born: march 25
column3: 2015. local florists send gifts on june 9
column4: 2015 doris susan beloved wife of john w. stokes sr. devoted mother of dorothy durst
column7: deborah hill and the late john stokes jr. and robert stokes sr. loving sister of loy gochenour and the late eddie gochenour. doris is also a grandmother to 13 grandchildren and 9 great grandchildren. the family will receive friends at the family owned and operated connelly funeral home of dundalk
column9: on friday from 2-4 & 6-8 pm. a funeral service to celebrate doriss life will be held friday evening at 7pm. interment will be held on saturday 12noon at valley pike cemetery
